name: Battle Bouncers
description:
BATTLE BOUNCERSby The Teachers Lounge

Wave goodbye to your friends as you join the new wave of Extreme Trampoline Champions.

Fight using such advanced techniques as the world renowned "Double bounce" to fling your enemies off the Polypropylene Pedestal as you fight to be the last standing. The first person to win 3 rounds wins the match!

Play as one of six characters:

  1. The Jock - Who needs pants?
  2. Mike Wave - His head is a microwave, enough said.
  3. Mr Handy Man - ...Uh, Handy to have around?
  4. Waif - "SHE'S NOT A WAIFU JACOB!" - Not a happy person.
  5. Ninja - Silent, but deadly.
  6. Bouncer - Won't let you on the trampoline, even if you're sober.

Battle Bouncers was originally created for Global Game Jam 2017, you can see the original submission here: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/battle-bouncers

  • 2-6 players (local-only).
  • Controller only (currently).
Controls
  • Movement - Left toggle stick
  • Mega Drop - Hold "A" button (Xbox) / Square Button(PS)
Developer Notes
  • This is an unfinished game, all of the base functionality is there, but it is far from final.
  • The game was developed with Xbox 360 controllers, though it does work PS4 controller. Keep in mind that other controllers may not be supported. Also it should be noted that your player number does not currently align with your controller number.
